Description: Standard combat against a group of equal strength.
A fight against a single powerful "Boss" entity.
Someone wants to buy sell or trade information.
A tense standoff or negotiation (e.g. checkpoint shakedown).
Someone is in distress and requires non-combat help.
An obstacle blocks the path (bridge out landslide lock).
A cipher ancient mechanism or riddle needs solving.
A crime scene or old ruin with clues to analyze.
Weather or terrain is the enemy (storm flood fire).
Roll twice and combine them (e.g. Combat during a Puzzle).
